RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired B reeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAMAICAN JIMMY stalked the early leader, forced the pace on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch proved best. SOUP SPOON set a pressured pace, had a slim lead on the turn, vied to mid stretch and held place. NO MORE was in touch, had a good position on the turn, angled outside in mid stretch and finished evenly. C BY THE SEA settled off the pace, trailed the field on the turn and was not a factor. JUNGLE TIGRESS was in range and hustled along on the turn but faded late.

ENTRY.NAME: No More
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, good position turn, angled out stretch, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Soup Spoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, vied stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Jimmy
ENTRY.OWNER: Vonkalckreuth Bart Alexander Langelaan Casey F Blair Guy Robert Fournier Mark Le
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, forced pace turn, 3-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Jungle Tigress
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, hustled along turn, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: C by the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, trailed turn, not a factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RADCLIFFE tracked the early leaders from the outside, had a bid on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch drew clear. BEND IN THE RIVER was unhurried early, raced evenly on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was up for place. GUNZIG STINGER was up close, a factor on the turn and had the lead from the four path at the top of the stretch but gave way. NAVAL OFFICER forced the early pace and dueled on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch leveled off. ROYAL BIZ showed speed from the inside and had a slim lead on the turn but had nothing left. FOREST SELECTION was off the pace and showed little in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, slim lead turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Bend in the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, evenly turn, 6-path stretch, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Naval Officer
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, dueled turn, 3-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Forest Selection
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Gunzig Stinger
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, factor turn, led 4-path stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Radcliffe
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, bid turn, 5-path stretch, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 7F Turf CR: 79. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited to 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SYNCHROMESH was unhurried early, moved up on the far turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch drew off. TWO YEAR CONTRACT was in range, raced evenly from the inside on the far turn and angled outside through the stretch but was no match for the winner. UNBRIDLED INFERNO was off the pace, saved ground on the far turn and was up for show. DR CHAPPELL was away alertly and a factor on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch weakened. LIL GREEN MACHINE showed speed from the inside and had a slim lead on the far turn but gave way at the top of the stretch. DIMMI QUANDO was well back, trailed the field on the far turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch passed tired foes. STRONG ATTITUDE was hustled early but lost ground on the far turn and was empty. SENSIBLE PORTIONS was up close but chased on the far turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was eased to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Green Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, slim lead far turn, gave way top stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Chappell
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sensible Portions
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, chased far turn, 6-path stretch, eased to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Inferno
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground far turn, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, lost ground far turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Two Year Contract
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly inside far turn, angled out stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Dimmi Quando
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed far turn, 7-path stretch, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Synchromesh
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, moved up far turn, 5-path stretch, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BORN TO BE GOOD set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. SUBZERO PLUS stalked the leader, was a factor on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch held place. MONASTERY LANE was well back, trailed the field on the turn and finished well. AWILDAS TREASURE was in range and raced evenly on the turn but from the five path a the top of the stretch had no late kick. MIDNIGHT MEADOW was in touch and roused on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch had no response. FANCYSOUL was unhurried early, in tight on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Subzero Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor turn, 4-path stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Fancysoul
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, in tight turn, 6-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Awildas Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Monastery Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, roused turn, 7-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Born to Be Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Roberto Joseph I and Cathcart Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since July 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE MORE BREW set a pressured pace, had a slim lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch prevailed. MORNING THOUGHTS was unhurried early, moved up on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was second best. MAYITO showed no speed, had a mild gain on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was up for show. SEVEN IS A BREEZE was off the pace and saved ground on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. CANT GLIDE BY KATZ forced the pace and was a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch weakened. ONE MORE RING was in touch but chased on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch had no impact. BODIE tracked the leaders from the inside and was roused on the turn but dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: One More Brew
ENTRY.OWNER: Bermuda Blue Farm and Wolf Paul Herbert
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Bodie
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Jeff and McGirr Jr Herbert
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, roused turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Glide by Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, factor turn, 4-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Seven Is a Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Morning Thoughts
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Robyn Voyce Casey Grant and Athoe Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, moved up turn, 5-path stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Mayito
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: One More Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, chased turn, 4-path stretch, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 7F Turf CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 18988. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Limited to 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed in advisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIGHTS AND SIRENS set the pace, had a clear lead on the far turn and was kept to task through the stretch. ALWAY'S ROSIE tracked the early leaders from the inside, had a good position on the far turn and had a bid in mid stretch but was no match for the winner. RUMOURS FLY was in range, saved ground on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch rallied late. TANGERINE TWIST was in touch and a factor on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. LIGHTNING MARIE was unhurried early and moved up on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. LADY OF THE FORT was off the pace and had a mild gain on the far turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch leveled off. LEA'S SUNSHINE stalked the early leader but lost ground on the far turn and had no impact. WICKEN CENTS was off slow and showed little while outrun. SAGED ENERGY was well back, trailed the field on the far turn and was never in contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Alway's Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, good position far turn, bid stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Rumours Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, saved ground far turn, 4-path stretch, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Wicken Cents
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed little, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Lea's Sunshine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, lost ground far turn, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lady of the Fort
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain far turn, 6-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Lights and Sirens
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Tangerine Twist
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, factor far turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Saged Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed far turn, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Marie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, moved up far turn, 5-path stretch, no late kick
